synopsis.text: Though she enrolls as a student at the esteemed Myoujou Academy, Tokaku Azuma's true purpose is far more sinister. As one of twelve skilled assassins in the 10th grade's Class Black, her mission is to eliminate the cheerful and seemingly ordinary student, Haru Ichinose. However, when Tokaku begins to develop feelings for her intended target, she resolves to shield Ichinose from the deadly intentions of their classmates, turning the tables on the assassination game. As the pair navigate the treacherous school year, they must confront the relentless onslaught of their fellow assassins, with the ultimate goal of ensuring Ichinose's survival and graduation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
